actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

official_title: To authorize the carrying out of a flood damage reduction and recreation project at Grand Forks, North Dakota, and East Grand Forks, Minnesota.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to carry out a flood damage reduction and recreation project at Grand Forks, North Dakota, and East Grand Forks, Minnesota, substantially in accordance with the plans and subject to the conditions recommended in a final report of the Chief of Engineers, as approved by the Secretary.

titles.title: To authorize the carrying out of a flood damage reduction and recreation project at Grand Forks, North Dakota, and East Grand Forks, Minnesota.
